nodes.name: Schedule Trigger
nodes.notes: Daily trigger at 9 AM for automated newsletter generation

nodes.name: Manual Trigger (Webhook)
nodes.notes: Manual trigger from Admin UI for on-demand generation

parameters.query: SELECT * FROM newsletter_configurations WHERE is_active = true AND next_send_date <= NOW()

nodes.name: Get Active Configurations
nodes.notes: PHASE 2: Fetch configurations due for send

nodes.name: Split Configurations
nodes.notes: PHASE 3: Process each configuration individually

parameters.query: =SELECT ci.* FROM content_items ci WHERE ci.topic_tags && ARRAY[{{ $json.segment_focus_topics }}]::text[] AND ci.publish_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '{{ $json.freshness_threshold }} days' AND ci.trust_score >= {{ $json.min_trust_score }} ORDER BY ci.relevance_score DESC LIMIT {{ $json.max_content_blocks }}

nodes.name: Select Content for Segment
nodes.notes: PHASE 3: Get content matching segment criteria (topic, freshness, trust score)

messageValues.message: =You are a cybersecurity newsletter writer. Brand voice: {{ $json.brand_voice_rules }}. Generate 3 subject line variants (max 60 chars each) for this newsletter segment targeting {{ $json.segment_name }}. Content summary: {{ $json.content_summary }}

nodes.name: Generate Subject Lines
nodes.notes: PHASE 4: AI Generation - Subject lines (2-3 variants)

messageValues.message: =Generate a compelling preheader text (60-90 chars) for this cybersecurity newsletter. Subject: {{ $json.selected_subject_line }}. Target audience: {{ $json.segment_name }}

nodes.name: Generate Preheader
nodes.notes: PHASE 4: AI Generation - Preheader (60-90 chars)

messageValues.message: =Write a personalized newsletter intro (2-3 sentences) for {{ $json.segment_name }}. Tone: {{ $json.brand_voice_rules }}. Context: {{ $json.segment_interests }}

nodes.name: Generate Intro Paragraph
nodes.notes: PHASE 4: AI Generation - Personalized intro

nodes.name: Split Content Blocks
nodes.notes: Loop through each content block for teaser generation

messageValues.message: =Write a compelling teaser (30-60 words) for this article. Title: {{ $json.content_title }}. Summary: {{ $json.content_summary }}. CTA: Drive clicks to read full article.

nodes.name: Generate Content Block Teaser
nodes.notes: PHASE 4: AI Generation - Block teasers (loop)

nodes.name: Aggregate Content Blocks
nodes.notes: Combine all generated teasers back into single item

nodes.name: Validate Brand Voice
nodes.notes: PHASE 5: Call backend for brand voice validation

nodes.name: Check Validation Result
nodes.notes: Branch on validation result

nodes.name: Create A/B Test Variants
nodes.notes: PHASE 6: Create A/B test variants with control and test groups

parameters.query:
=-- Only insert if A/B test is enabled
{{ $json.has_ab_test ? 
  "INSERT INTO test_variants (issue_id, variant_id, subject_line, test_type, is_control, created_at) VALUES (
    " + $json.issue_id + ", \"" + $json.variant_a.variant_id + "\", \"" + $json.variant_a.subject_line.replace(/"/g, "\\\"" ) + "\", \"" + $json.variant_a.test_type + "\", " + $json.variant_a.is_control + ", NOW()),
    (" + $json.issue_id + ", \"" + $json.variant_b.variant_id + "\", \"" + $json.variant_b.subject_line.replace(/"/g, "\\\"" ) + "\", \"" + $json.variant_b.test_type + "\", " + $json.variant_b.is_control + ", NOW())
  RETURNING *" 
  : "SELECT \"No A/B test variants to save\" as message"
}}

nodes.name: Save Test Variants to DB
nodes.notes: PHASE 6: Store variant definitions in database

nodes.name: Assign Contacts to Variants
nodes.notes: PHASE 6: Random 50/50 assignment of contacts to variants

parameters.query: =INSERT INTO newsletter_issues (config_id, segment_id, subject_line, preheader, intro_html, blocks_json, status, scheduled_send_date, has_ab_test, created_at) VALUES ({{ $json.config_id }}, {{ $json.segment_id }}, '{{ $json.variant_a.subject_line }}', '{{ $json.preheader }}', '{{ $json.intro_html }}', '{{ JSON.stringify($json.content_blocks) }}', CASE WHEN {{ $json.approval_tier }} = 2 THEN 'pending_approval' ELSE 'ready_to_send' END, {{ $json.scheduled_send_date }}, true, NOW()) RETURNING id as issue_id

nodes.name: Save Newsletter Issue
nodes.notes: PHASE 7: Save issue to database with A/B test flag

nodes.name: Route by Approval Tier
nodes.notes: PHASE 7: Route based on configuration approval tier

nodes.name: Send Immediately (Tier 1)
nodes.notes: Tier 1: Auto-send to delivery workflow with variant assignments

nodes.name: Wait for Approval (Tier 2)
nodes.notes: Tier 2: Status = pending_approval, variant data ready for approval

nodes.name: Retry Delay
nodes.notes: Wait before retrying failed validation (max 2 attempts)

nodes.name: Check Retry Count
nodes.notes: Track retry attempts (max 2)

parameters.content:
## PHASE 1: Trigger
- Daily schedule at 9 AM
- Manual webhook from UI
- Merge both triggers

## PHASE 2: Config Fetch
- Get active configurations
- Filter by next_send_date

## PHASE 3: Content Selection
- Process each config
- Select content by segment
- Filter by topic, freshness, trust

## PHASE 4: AI Generation
- Subject lines (3 variants)
- Preheader (60-90 chars)
- Intro paragraph
- Content block teasers

## PHASE 5: Validation
- Call backend API
- Check brand voice rules
- Retry if invalid (max 2)

## PHASE 6: A/B Testing
- Create variant definitions (A/B)
- Save variants to database
- Assign contacts randomly (50/50)
- Track variant_id for analytics
- Store assignment timestamps

## PHASE 7: Save & Route
- Save to database
- Route by approval tier
- Tier 1: Auto-send
- Tier 2: Pending approval
